hero.title: Welcome
hero.subtitle: We celebrate the preservation of Indian heritage and strengthen community bonds through cultural events, festivals, and meaningful connections.
mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to preserving and celebrating Indian culture while fostering unity and support within our community.
mission.point1: Preserve and promote Indian cultural heritage
mission.point3: Support members of the community in need
events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Join us for our upcoming festivals and cultural programs

whatsnew.gallery.title: New Gallery
whatsnew.gallery.desc: See photos from our recent Navratri celebration
whatsnew.members.title: New Members
whatsnew.members.desc: Welcome to 15 new families who joined this month
whatsnew.support.title: Community Support
whatsnew.support.desc: Your support helps us continue our mission
